m_szDocTitle: UHG receives $4m investment from Amplats for FCEV development in north-east US | News | gasworld
m_szDocSumamry: UHG receives $4m investment from Amplats for FCEV development in north-east US Save The United Hydrogen Group (UHG) has received a $4m investment from platinum group metals producer, Anglo American Platinum (Amplats), to help reduce delivery costs of hydrogen (H2) and support development of H2 refuelling stations for fuel cell electric vehicles (FCEVs) in the north-east of the US. UHG will work closely with fellow H2 technology company, Hydrogenious Technologies, to deliver hydrogen logistics and reduce costs for FCEV developments under this investment.
